description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军中将，曾任中国人民解放军南部战区海军司令员、海军副司令员、北部战区海军参谋长，以及辽宁号航空母舰首位航母编队司令员。
description.en: A vice admiral of the People's Liberation Army Navy of China, who has served as commander of the Southern Theater Command Navy, deputy commander of the Navy, chief of staff of the Northern Theater Command Navy, and the first commander of the Liaoning aircraft carrier formation.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军南部战区海军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南部战区海军
中国人民解放军海军南海舰队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南部战区的海军，亦称“中国人民解放军海军南海舰队”。
description.en: The navy of the Southern Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army, also known as the South Sea Fleet of the PLA Navy.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的海上武装力量，中国人民解放军的海上分支。
description.en: The naval warfare branch of the People's Liberation Army, the armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军北部战区海军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北部战区海军
中国人民解放军海军北海舰队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北部战区的海军，亦称“中国人民解放军海军北海舰队”。
description.en: The navy of the Northern Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army, also known as the North Sea Fleet of the PLA Navy.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军隶下的航空母舰。
description.en: An aircraft carrier of the People's Liberation Army Navy.

description.zh-cn: 位于亚洲的社会主义国家，通常简称“中国”。
description.en: A socialist state in Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Zhejiang Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军海军中将

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军中将

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军的中等级别将领军衔。
description.en: A mid-level admiral rank in the People's Liberation Army Navy.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2017年至2022年间的最高领导机关。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China from 2017 to 2022.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军南部战区海军航空兵

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南部战区海军航空兵
中国人民解放军海军南海舰队航空兵

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南部战区海军的航空兵部队。
description.en: The aviation branch of the PLA Southern Theater Command Navy.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军装备的导弹驱逐舰舰级。王海曾担任该级下的重庆号导弹驱逐舰舰长。
description.en: A class of guided-missile destroyers of the People's Liberation Army Navy. Wang Hai served as the captain of the Chongqing, a ship of this class.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军少将。
description.en: A rear admiral of the People's Liberation Army Navy.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军南部战区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南部战区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在中国南部设立的战区。
description.en: A theater command of the People's Liberation Army of China established in the southern part of the country.

description.zh-cn: 中国和俄罗斯在2015年举行的联合军事演习。
description.en: A joint military exercise conducted by China and Russia in 2015.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军上将，曾任中国人民解放军海军司令员。
description.en: An admiral of the People's Liberation Army Navy, who served as the commander of the PLA Navy.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th national legislature of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军中将，南部战区海军司令员。
description.en: A vice admiral of the People's Liberation Army Navy, commander of the Southern Theater Command Navy.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军少将。
description.en: A rear admiral of the People's Liberation Army Navy.

description.zh-cn: 王海是浙江舟山人。
description.en: Wang Hai is from Zhoushan, Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 王海是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Wang Hai is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 王海在中国人民解放军海军服役。
description.en: Wang Hai serves in the People's Liberation Army Navy.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南部战区海军航空兵

description.zh-cn: 王海曾在海军南海舰队航空兵部队服役。
description.en: Wang Hai served in the naval aviation force of the South Sea Fleet.

description.zh-cn: 1995年4月至1998年3月，王海任重庆号导弹驱逐舰舰长。
description.en: From April 1995 to March 1998, Wang Hai served as the captain of the destroyer Chongqing.

position.en: First Commander of the Carrier Battle Group

description.zh-cn: 2012年9月起，王海担任辽宁舰航母编队首任司令员。
description.en: Starting from September 2012, Wang Hai served as the first commander of the Liaoning carrier battle group.

description.zh-cn: 2014年1月，王海接替魏钢少将任中国人民解放军海军北海舰队参谋长。
description.en: In January 2014, Wang Hai succeeded Rear Admiral Wei Gang as Chief of Staff of the PLA Navy's North Sea Fleet.

description.zh-cn: 2015年4月，姜国平接替王海担任中国人民解放军海军北海舰队参谋长。
description.en: In April 2015, Jiang Guoping succeeded Wang Hai as Chief of Staff of the PLA Navy's North Sea Fleet.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军北部战区海军

description.zh-cn: 2014年1月至2015年4月，王海担任中国人民解放军海军北海舰队参谋长。
description.en: From January 2014 to April 2015, Wang Hai served as Chief of Staff of the PLA Navy's North Sea Fleet.

description.zh-cn: 2015年7月至2017年1月，王海担任中国人民解放军海军副司令员。
description.en: From July 2015 to January 2017, Wang Hai served as Deputy Commander of the PLA Navy.

description.zh-cn: 在2015年8月举行的中俄“海上联合—2015（Ⅱ）”演习中，王海担任联合军演中方总导演。
description.en: In the Sino-Russian "Joint Sea-2015 (II)" exercise held in August 2015, Wang Hai served as the chief director from the Chinese side.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军中将

description.zh-cn: 2016年7月，王海晋升为海军中将军衔。
description.en: In July 2016, Wang Hai was promoted to the rank of Vice Admiral.

description.zh-cn: 2017年1月，王海接替沈金龙出任南海舰队司令员。
description.en: In January 2017, Wang Hai succeeded Shen Jinlong as Commander of the South Sea Fleet.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南部战区

description.zh-cn: 2017年1月，王海任中国人民解放军南部战区副司令员。
description.en: In January 2017, Wang Hai was appointed Deputy Commander of the PLA Southern Theater Command.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南部战区海军

description.zh-cn: 2017年1月至2023年2月，王海担任南部战区海军司令员。
description.en: From January 2017 to February 2023, Wang Hai served as Commander of the Southern Theater Command Navy.

description.zh-cn: 2023年2月，王海卸任南部战区海军司令员，由鞠新春接任。
description.en: In February 2023, Wang Hai stepped down as commander of the Southern Theater Command Navy and was succeeded by Ju Xinchun.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 2017年10月，王海在中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会上当选中央委员会候补委员。
description.en: In October 2017, Wang Hai was elected as an alternate member of the Central Committee at the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年2月24日，王海当选为第十三届全国人大代表。
description.en: On February 24, 2018, Wang Hai was elected as a deputy to the 13th National People's Congress.
